metadata.title: USN-6068-1 -- Open vSwitch vulnerability
metadata.description: David Marchand discovered that Open vSwitch incorrectly handled IP packets with the protocol set to 0. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6068-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  openvswitch-doc - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-switch - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-pki - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 ovn-docker - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-common - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 python-openvswitch - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-testcontroller - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-vtep - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 ovn-central - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 python3-openvswitch - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 ovn-host - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 ovn-common - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-switch-dpdk - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 ovn-controller-vtep - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 openvswitch-test - 2.9.8-0ubuntu0.18.04.5 No subscription required
